tool_description: Updates asset maintenance history with completed work order information and tracks asset condition and lifecycle data.

asset_id.description: Asset ID to update maintenance history for

work_order_id.description: Completed work order ID to record

maintenance_type.description: Type of maintenance performed: preventive, corrective, emergency, upgrade

condition_after.description: Asset condition after maintenance: excellent, good, fair, poor, critical

parts_replaced.description: List of parts or components replaced

next_service_due.description: Date when next service is due

error_messages: Asset not found: The provided asset_id does not exist in the system.
Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist.
Invalid maintenance type: Use one of [preventive, corrective, emergency, upgrade].
Invalid condition rating: Use one of [excellent, good, fair, poor, critical].
Invalid completion date: completion_date must be a valid date-time in the past.
Work order not completed: The work order must be in 'completed' status to update asset history.
History already updated: This work order has already been recorded in asset history.
usage: Provide asset_id, work_order_id, maintenance_type, and completion_date. Optionally specify condition_after, parts_replaced, and next_service_due. Updates asset maintenance history and lifecycle tracking.

history_record_id.description: Unique ID of the created history record

total_maintenance_cost.description: Cumulative maintenance cost for this asset
